Package org.efaps.update

The class and packages inside this package are used to update the Objects inside eFaps.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractUpdate
    This class is the major class for importing or updating of types, commands and so on in eFaps.
    AbstractUpdate.Link
    The class is used to define the links with all information needed to update the link information between the object to update and the related objects.
    AbstractUpdate.OrderedLink
    Some links has a order in the database.
    AbstractUpdate.UniqueLink
    Some links has a order in the database.

    Enum Description
    FileType
    Main File type definition for the import and update of files.
    UpdateLifecycle
    All steps used within update life cycle.

Package org.efaps.update Description

The class and packages inside this package are used to update the Objects inside eFaps. Updating in this case means that through xml-Files Objects can be defined, created and updated.
